attributes.additional_details:
We the people,

Call on Her Majesty's government for the criminalisation of openly denying the Holocaust took place.

Denial of the Holocaust is incredibly morally wrong on the level of deep pain it brings to people directly effected by the Holocaust, and the Holocaust needs to be remembered so nothing of which can happen again.

Over 6,000,000 Jewish people were killed in the Holocaust, UNDENIABLY we must respect the victims dead or alive by criminalising the open denial of the Holocaust.
